item.description:
For those of us who couldn't make the Intro to Rock Climbing Meetup at MetroRock, I am riding the tailfeathers of all Kyle's hard work and attempting to make it happen on a weeknight.

We'll be doing the basic climbing course Wednesday night at 7 pm. For $40 this course will allow us to.....

Learn the basic elements of climbing safety, including:

1) Equipment: how to use a harness and belay device

2) Knots: tying in with a figure 8 follow-through, plus a fisherman's backup

3) Belaying: using a locking carabiner and ATC to confidently keep your climbing partner safe

4) Commands: how to communicate with your climbing partner

After taking this course, most students can safely pass the MetroRock belay check, necessary to climb in the gym.

Check out the details and get directions to Metrorock Everett at their website:

http://www.metrorock....

YOU MUST REGISTER THROUGH METROROCK TO SECURE A SPOT & ATTEND! Call them at 617-387-ROCK (7625)

We'll meet at 7 pm, with plans to get geared up and waivers signed for the class at 7:30.

If folks are interested, we'll grab a bite to eat or drink following the class.

Contact Lisa (vetchick) with any questions.
item.name: Intro to Rock Climbing--Attempt Deux
